title: Execution Memory Add Output
description: Result of storing execution details in MemoryOS with information about the operation success and execution processing status.

success.description: Whether the execution memory addition was successful

message_id.description: Unique identifier linking this execution to its conversation pair

timestamp.description: When the execution memory was stored (ISO 8601)

execution_summary.description: The execution summary that was stored

tools_used.description: List of tools that were executed

duration_ms.description: How long the execution took in milliseconds

success.description: Whether the overall execution was successful

has_meta_data.description: Whether metadata was provided and stored

memory_processing.description: Information about execution memory processing and storage
